summary: preset files of my ningheim based character lynn with a focus on natural appearance. this preset is a suggestion and hopefully a good basis for you to easily create your own handsome female character.
descriptionHtml:
an additional preset of mine. not really planned for public but i think it's a good opportunity to say "thank you" to all the diligent and helpful modders and friends here on nexus and all others who like my presets.

a race menu preset file of my ningheim race character lynn. but it is more than that if you try my cute finges package.
if you want her as on the screenshots i recommend to install the cute
fingers ningheim option.

if you want the body, eyes and teeth in the screenshots use my uploaded body, eye and teeth replacers.

the focus was laid on natural appearance, high detail. so the easy
customizable and out of the box cute ningheim race was the best choice
for me to create close up capable detailed female character with some
eye candy addons.

some mods must or at least should be installed to get the correct results.
the preset file has to be placed at the right place. put it just in the folder where your other loadable presets are located!

[u][b]YOU NEED THE FOLLOWING MODS and addons for full details and correct appearance[/b] (and of course [b]credits to all modders providing the basis for my presets[/b]):[/u]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35474/?]the ningheim race[/url] (including some of its options to prevent crashes with some of the racemenu sliders!)
current race menu version
skse for hdt options (most good stuff probably does not run without it)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]ks hairdo's renewal[/url] for the hair, additionally hdt if you use the hdt hair options
stoja's warpaints (for correct face paint)
eyes of beauty
my ningheim cute fingers fitness body option in my [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82568/?]cute fingers seamless body mod[/url] is strictly recommended for a full detailed unp based character (just don't use it on low end rigs)


for some ningheim addons have a look in my file options here or in my
katarina ningheim preset mod files folder first. you may not find some
of them in the nexus mod list anymore.
if one of the listed mods is not available anywhere just let me know!

be shure that no parts of the above mods are unintentionally overwritten by other mods!


[u]recommended options if preset does not appear as expected:
[/u]i use unp skinny body as my body base. if you encounter problems try this
as your body base. you may also enhance your npc and other races with
my high res cute fingers seamless body options. 
i recommend my teeth replacer for ningheim and other races ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73328/?]better teeth for human races[/url]) or my first and slightly different version (see file folder)
if you do not use ks hairdos hdt option you may have to change the hdt hair to a non hdt one in the racemenu.
same if you use other warpaint than stojas warpaint, eye or eyebrow options.

if something still does not show as indended check your modlist first. you
may correct some errors in your loaded preset if you change eye and  hair in racemenu.
in all other cases you may pm me or just leave a post with a description of your problem.

[u]installation of the preset:[/u]
- unpack and put the preset file in the folder data\skse\plugins\chargen\presets (if you use mo it also can be the
overwrite folder depending on your installation settings).
- open console ingame an type showracemenu
- select ningheim race female if not already set
- chose "preset" button in the menu and then the preset load button and load the desired preset.
- you may change and optimize the preset now. don't forget to save it in a new preset and to save the game.

you see parts of sylva dragon jewels in some of my screenshots.

if you use the unp mature skin texture mod (cute fingers skin mod is recommended) be shure to use my
patched face skin texture uploaded as optional file. otherwise my
face presets doesn't match the sceenshots. i patched the skin around the
eyes to preserve as much detail as possible. all credits for this texture go to the original author.**

for your standard npc and female characters you may try in additionally my other [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82568/?]cute fingers unp mod options[/url]

[b]you may watch [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/search/?gsearch=xrayy&gsearchtype=authors&tab=mods]my other skyrim mods[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/searchresults/?quicksrc_name=File+name&quicksrc_auth=xrayy&quicksrc_game=110] here[/url]﻿[/b].

* you are welcome to post your preset screenshot in the user image section *
thank you for trying my presets and have fun playing skyrim!

[u]credits[/u]
thanks  to all the modders of the listed mods above for making this preset possible
and
thank you  to all for trying it and especially to the obviously rapidly decreasing number of downloaders still taking their time to leave an endorsment!
author: xrayy
